title: derank
body: Hey guys,i'm curios if i can derank from gold to silver (solo/duo or flex 5v5/3v3) due to inactivity.For example,i'm gold in all of them mods,can  i derank if i don't play them anymore?

replies.body:
*Lew* is correct, you're only subject to decay if you're in **Platinum Tier or higher**. You can find this and other important competitive information in our [**Ranked Play FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h3q1), so I recommend you check it out.

Please let me know if you have any further questions.
The isnt any ranked decay if you are gold or lower.
